summary: Marks player character essential to prevent death. Limited number of recoveries, refreshed on sleeping. Gold percentage penalty on recovery. Adjustable via Mod Configuration Menu.
descriptionHtml:
This mod flags the player as \'essential\', preventing them from dying in combat. This can only be done a customizable number of times before having to sleep to regain spent recoveries. Additionally, gold and other penalties in future versions can be customized as well.

The mod is currently in an alpha stage, meaning bugs and issues are expected to occur. Therefore, please keep a clean save for your character, made before installing any version of this mod, so you can always revert to this clean save if your game is corrupted later on.

I will keep this front page updated with important announcements or concerns as they are discovered. Remember to check required files and readme before installing. Please use the forum topics for general discussion, issue tracking and suggestions.
author: Sjakal

files.name: Live Forever v1
files.changelogHtml:
Toggle player essential to defeat them at 0 health instead of killing them.
Recover on keypress if defeated (costs 1 recovery).
Recoveries regained on sleeping (adjustable).
Gold loss percentage on recovery (adjustable).
